org.cleverbus.core.common.contextcall
Class ContextCallRoute

java.lang.Object
  org.apache.camel.builder.BuilderSupport
      org.apache.camel.builder.RouteBuilder
          org.apache.camel.spring.SpringRouteBuilder
              org.cleverbus.api.route.AbstractBasicRoute
                  org.cleverbus.core.common.contextcall.ContextCallRoute
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.apache.camel.RoutesBuilder, Aware, ApplicationContextAware
@CamelConfiguration
public class ContextCallRoute
extends AbstractBasicRoute

Route that serves as input URI for calling from one Spring context to another context. Route expects HTTP GET call with unique call identifier to ContextCallRegistry.

Author:
Petr Juza
